ac_spare_parts_schema.name: AC Spare Parts Thiruvalla
ac_spare_parts_schema.description: Genuine AC spare parts for all brands in Thiruvalla Kerala. We stock original manufacturer parts for all major brands including compressors, cooling coils, PCB boards, capacitors, thermostats, remote controls, filters, fan motors, and more. Every part comes with genuine parts guarantee and 6 month warranty. Same-day delivery in Thiruvalla, bulk order discounts available.

review.reviewBody: Got genuine Daikin AC compressor with warranty. Fast delivery in Thiruvalla and installation support was excellent. Highly recommend Cool Wind!
Needed LG AC PCB board urgently for my service center. Cool Wind delivered same day with bulk discount. Great supplier!
Excellent quality capacitors and relays for Samsung AC. Perfect fit and reasonable pricing. Will order again.
Good quality cooling coil for Blue Star AC. Came with warranty and working perfectly. Delivery was quick.

refrigerator_spare_parts_schema.name: Refrigerator Spare Parts Kerala
refrigerator_spare_parts_schema.description: Original refrigerator spare parts with warranty in Kerala. We stock genuine manufacturer parts for all major brands including compressors, thermostats, door seals, gaskets, defrost timers, PCB boards, fan motors, ice maker components, and more. Every part comes with genuine parts guarantee and 6 month warranty. Same-day delivery in Thiruvalla and across Kerala.

review.reviewBody: Got genuine LG refrigerator compressor with warranty. Fast delivery in Thiruvalla and installation support was excellent. Highly recommend!
Needed Samsung fridge thermostat urgently. Cool Wind delivered same day with proper warranty documentation. Great service!
Excellent quality door seals for Whirlpool refrigerator. Perfect fit and reasonable pricing. Will order again.
Good quality PCB board for Godrej fridge. Came with warranty and working perfectly. Delivery was quick.

google_requirements_met: Offers object with price, currency, and availability

All URLs match actual page locations
